results.title: [Documento de consenso de la Sociedad Espanola de Obstetricia y Ginecologia (SEGO) y el Comite Espanol Interdisciplinario para la Prevencion Vascular (CEIPV). Ventana de oportunidad: prevencion del riesgo vascular en la mujer. Resultados adversos del embarazo y riesgo de enfermedad vascular.]
results.text_hl: Future studies evaluating the use of @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, statins, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, among others, in women with a history of @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@APOs@@@ could strengthen recommendations regarding pharmacotherapy for primary prevention of @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@VD@@@ in these patients.

results.title: Metformin exposure, maternal PCOS status and fetal venous liver circulation: A randomized, placebo-controlled study
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is prescribed to @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@) to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@.

results.title: Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcome, metabolic profile, and sex hormone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome and their offspring: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Although the relative low quality of randomized controlled trials (RCTs) and limited results made it difficult to draw a definite conclusion, our study showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment during pregnancy can reduce the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@ but may have impacts on increasing @GENE_SHBG @GENE_6462 @@@SHBG@@@ levels and long-term BMI in offspring.

citations.NLM: Zhu D, Chen Y, Huang J, Deng H, Shen X, Lu D, Xu L. Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcome, metabolic profile, and sex hormone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome and their offspring: a systematic review and meta-analysis Ann Transl Med. 2022 Apr;10(7):418. PMID: 35530948

results.title: [Metformin and the obstetric patient].
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@Polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@) is associated with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, @DISEASE_Infertility @DISEASE_MESH:D007246 @@@infertility@@@, @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and gestational complications. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is widely used in fertility treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, due to a suggested positive effect of continued @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment beyond the first trimester on @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@.

citations.NLM: Pedersen KD, Bülow NS, Aaboe K, Galsgaard J, Odgaard HS, Mathiesen ER, Lauenborg J. [Metformin and the obstetric patient]. Ugeskr Laeger. 2015 Dec 7;177(50):V05150438. PMID: 26651913

results.title: Metformin reduces pregnancy complications without affecting androgen levels in pregnant polycystic ovary syndrome women: results of a randomized study.
results.text_hl: In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated group we observed a reduction of severe, @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy and post-partum complications@@@.

results.title: Pregnancy outcome in women with polycystic ovary syndrome comparing the effects of laparoscopic ovarian drilling and clomiphene citrate stimulation in women pre-treated with metformin: a retrospective study
results.text_hl: By analyzing all @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@ together, the overall @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complication@@@ rate was highest in the CC group (70.0%, 28/40), followed by the LOD group (45.0%, 18/40), and the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ only group (47.5%, 19/40; p = 0.047).

results.title: Clomiphene, metformin, or both for infertility in the polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: With the exception of @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@, adverse-event rates were similar in all groups, though @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@gastrointestinal side effects@@@ were more frequent, and @DISEASE_Rhinitis_Vasomotor @DISEASE_MESH:D012223 @@@vasomotor and ovulatory symptoms@@@ less frequent, in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group than in the @CHEMICAL_Clomiphene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002996 @@@clomiphene@@@ group.

results.title: Efficacy of metformin in pregnant obese women: a randomised controlled trial
results.text_hl: We present a protocol for a study to test the hypothesis that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ will improve @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, thereby reducing the incidence of high birthweight babies and other @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011248 @@@pregnancy complications@@@.

citations.NLM: Chiswick CA, Reynolds RM, Denison FC, Whyte SA, Drake AJ, Newby DE, Walker BR, Forbes S, Murray GD, Quenby S, Wray S, Norman JE. Efficacy of metformin in pregnant obese women: a randomised controlled trial BMJ Open. 2015 Jan 14;5(1):e006854. PMID: 25588785
